mapper.select: SELECT g.evaluation_guide_id AS evaluation_guide_id, g.name AS name, g.content AS content, g.created_at AS created_at, g.employee_id AS employee_id, e.employee_name AS employee_name, g.department_id AS department_id, d.department_name AS department_name, e.grade_id AS grade_id, t.grade AS grade FROM tbl_evaluation_guide g JOIN tbl_employee e ON g.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN tbl_department d ON d.department_id = e.employee_id JOIN tbl_grade t ON t.grade_id = e.grade_id

SELECT g.evaluation_guide_id AS evaluation_guide_id, g.name AS name, g.content AS content, g.created_at AS created_at, g.employee_id AS employee_id, e.employee_name AS employee_name, g.department_id AS department_id, d.department_name AS department_name, e.grade_id AS grade_id, t.grade AS grade FROM tbl_evaluation_guide g JOIN tbl_employee e ON g.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN tbl_department d ON d.department_id = e.employee_id JOIN tbl_grade t ON t.grade_id = e.grade_id WHERE g.evaluation_guide_id = #{guideId}
